txt.en: \qOn the Patterns of Wind and Rain\q is said to contain the observations of an Elf who travelled across Middle-earth studying its weather patterns.
On the Patterns of Wind and Rain

You have heard it whispered that the libraries of Moria yet contain many tomes, while many other volumes were brought by the dwarves seeking to reclaim their ancient realm. One such tome in the libraries of the Iron Garrison is said to be the legendary \qOn the Patterns of Wind and Rain.\q If you can gain enough favour with the Iron Garrison Guards, they may let you have their copy of this book.
Read the book, \qOn the Patterns of Wind and Rain\q
